Reason: The _monitor configuration option in the prevayler software project is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the monitoring and logging functionalities of the system. If the value of _monitor is set to true, the system will continuously monitor and log various activities, leading to increased overhead in terms of execution time and memory consumption. On the other hand, if _monitor is set to false, the system will not perform monitoring and logging, resulting in lower overhead. Therefore, any change in the value of _monitor can significantly affect system performance.
